name: lightTribeDocs
description: Swagger-UI static pages for LightTribe REST interface

scripts.prepublish: git checkout develop -- api/swagger.json && npm version patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'Update swagger.json from develop branch using npm script'
scripts.updateDocs: npm install swagger-ui && cp -r ./node_modules/swagger-ui/dist/* . && rm -rf ./node_modules && git add -A && git commit -m 'Updated swagger-ui for docs'
